arb.curves
 

  • Uses of PlaneCurve in arb.curves

    Classes in arb.curves that implement PlaneCurve
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Circle
    A circle coordinate function representing a circle having a basepoint and radius that goes well with the NewtonMap of the ComplexRealPart of the CompositionOperator applied as the composition of the SFunction with the ComplexCircle for instance / Re(S(circle(0,0.01,θ))) \ θ - | ---------------------------- | \ d/dθ(Re(S(circle(0,0.01,θ))) /
    class 
    Lemniscate
    A parameterization of a scaled Bernoullian lemniscate whose
    curvature is given by
    κ(t) = ((3*√2)*cos(t))/(scale*√(3-cos(2t)))
    and its tangential angle by
    φ(t) = 3*tan^⁻¹(sin(t))
    class 
    RectangularHyperbola
    A parameterization of a rectangular unit hyperbola where t ranges over -Pi to Pi: sec(t)+itan(t) TODO: add scale factor
